title: Accidental shooting hurts Wichita child
content:
WICHITA, Kan. -
A shot was fired just before 9:30 p.m. Tuesday in the 700 block of S Fountain. Police say the gun involved belonged to a 36-year-old man, identified as a friend of the child's dad. The man stayed on scene to talk with police, and was arrested for aggravated battery.
The child was hit in the leg and is expected to make a full recovery.
